ygData.messageBody:
A little mouse in your ear says "buy your brother a new computer too, he's a
good guy and his computer sucks!".

Hahahaha just kidding



-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 11:29 AM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Great EQ Computer?

some of
you people use to play EQ. Going to spend a good bit so anyone have
any
suggestions for GREAT eq computer (that's about all I do with the
computer
play EQ, Web and MP3's). Anyone have any ideas?

Mu
